channel.title: Handler help =S [It's not that hard]

item.title: Handler help =S [It's not that hard]
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I’ve got pretty much everything down, with a bit of a help, but when it comes down to using an item on item that’s contained in the handler, I get this error:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 136 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:17336) at client.packetProcess(client.java:15497) at client.packetSending(client.java:15466) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:149) at server.main(server.java:56)

CheckForSkillUse(); - In there, I have } else { server.fletchingHandler.fletchingHandler(); }

if(packetSize == -1) { if(avail > 0) { packetSize = in.read() & 0xff; avail--; } else return false; } if(avail < packetSize) return false; fillInStream(packetSize); timeOutCounter = 0;
Line 15497 is else return false; }

if (globalMessage.length() > 0) { sendMessage(globalMessage); globalMessage = ""; }
globalMessage = “”; is line 15466

			while(players[i].packetSending());

Is the one in playerhandler

			playerHandler.process();

Is the one in server

Please help. That’s all you need, and I really just want this handler done and over with.

Thanks.

I really need help >.>

Read full topic
